Comments: \u00a77\u00a7o41 pages, 1 figure. v2: 43 pages, 1 figure. Extended discussion, minor corrections and revisions (arguments unchanged). v3: Added result on uniqueness of solution with least-square forecasterrors (other results
unchanged); used a standard New Keynesian example; added introductory example (of Taylor's); generally reorganized,and edited prose\u00a7r
